title: The First Man Off The Plane
description: David O. Strickland's darkly comic novel is set during EGRESS RECAP--the return of American POWs from Vietnam's "Hanoi Hilton" in 1973. Like Kurt Vonnegut's classic SLAUGHTERHOUSE FIVE, THE FIRST MAN OFF THE PLANE features POWs...as well as the Vietnamese, the Home Front, and the Nixon Administration--including President Richard Milhous Nixon, Henry Kissinger, John Ehrlichman, H.R. Haldeman, John Dean, General Alexander Haig, and Hugh Hefner's Playmates...among others.
author: David O. Strickland
